text: Si amatungo yanyu canke ibibondo vyanyu bizobegereza iwacu kurugero rwo mw’ijuru, ahubwo uwemeye Imana yiwe y’ukuri hamwe nukugira ibikorwa vyiza abo rero nibo bazoronswa impembo niniya cane kubera ibikorwa vyiza bakoze, nabo bazoba bari mumahoro ntangere kandi bari mumazu agerekeranye kuyandi ari mw’Ijuru
